PhotoOrganizer Settings
Menu Pictures Filter Options Import Pictures Add Tag Filter Pictures Import Pictures Add Tag Date Range Tag Radius Area Tag Label Associated Tags Directory Google Drive Api Key Change Google Account


 1/ UPLOAD (upload icon) uploads a text file to Google Drive, creating a simple tree directory structure in the process.
 The createTree() method allows for testing of different CRUD primitives (search, create folder, etc…) in the process.

 2/ DOWNLOAD (download icon) scans the tree created by the createTree() method. If the object is a file, it's metadata is updated (description field), the content is downloaded.

 3/ DELETE (X - delete icon) scans the tree created by the createTree() method and deletes all the files and folders in the process

UPLOAD file DOWNLOAD all files DELETE all files Select Google Account…
CHECK PackageName / SHA1
in Developers Console! UNSPECIFIED GOOGLE DRIVE
